card.name: CW - GCCW127 - Uploading app time out

data.text: Hi Guys, the only solution I can think of is increasing the time out on the application itself which means the application needs to be distributed to all the agents again. And this isnâ€™t a guarantee that it will work, as it depends on their internet speed, how many images at a time they are uploading and obviously server health / strain.  @gillianoberholzer @willemhuman @yasserogier @cobuspienaar @neilbosworth
